price: A o tome ništa ne znaju, slijede samo pretpostavke, a pretpostavka Istini baš nimalo ne koristi.
arabic: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā lahum bihi min ʿil'min in yattabiʿūna illā al-ẓana wa-inna al-ẓana lā yugh'nī mina al-ḥaqi shayan
